headline.main: Victories Are Reported; RUSSIANS ADMIT HEAVY NAZI BLOWS

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Wednesday, Oct. 8 (U.P.) -- The Russians reported today that Soviet forces were winning impressive victories in the southern and Leningrad sectors. However, the critical battles were being fought on the route to Russia's capital.
